text_content:
RENTAL AGREEMENT

This Rental Agreement (“Agreement”) is made and entered into on this 1st day of September, 2025, by and between:

Landlord: Mr. Rajesh Sharma
Address: 12/4 Green Park, New Delhi, India

Tenant: Mr. Nathan Pimenta
Address: 45 MG Road, Bengaluru, India

1. PREMISES
The Landlord agrees to rent to the Tenant the property located at:
Flat No. 201, Lotus Residency, Green Park, New Delhi – 110016.

2. TERM
The term of this Agreement shall begin on the 1st day of September, 2025, and shall end on the 31st day of August, 2026 (fixed term).

3. RENT
The Tenant agrees to pay the Landlord rent in the amount of ₹25,000 per month, payable on or before the 5th day of each month.
Payment shall be made to: Rajesh Sharma, Account No. XXXXXXXX, HDFC Bank, New Delhi.

4. SECURITY DEPOSIT
The Tenant shall pay a security deposit of ₹75,000 prior to taking possession of the Premises. This deposit shall be refundable at the end of the tenancy, less any deductions for damages, unpaid rent, or other charges permitted by law.

5. UTILITIES
The Tenant shall be responsible for payment of electricity, water, internet, and gas charges.
The Landlord shall be responsible for property tax and maintenance charges to the housing society.

6. USE OF PREMISES
The Premises shall be used exclusively as a private residence. The Tenant shall not sublet the property or use it for commercial purposes without written consent.

7. MAINTENANCE AND REPAIRS
- The Tenant shall keep the Premises clean and in good condition.
- The Landlord shall be responsible for major repairs such as structural damage, plumbing, or electrical faults not caused by the Tenant’s negligence.

8. RULES AND REGULATIONS
The Tenant agrees not to keep pets on the premises without permission, not to smoke inside the flat, and to follow all housing society rules.

9. TERMINATION
Upon termination of this Agreement, the Tenant shall return possession of the Premises in good condition, ordinary wear and tear excepted.

10. GOVERNING LAW
This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Republic of India.

11. ENTIRE AGREEMENT
This Agreement constitutes the entire understanding between the parties and may only be modified in writing signed by both Landlord and Tenant.

SIGNATURES

Landlord: __________________ Rajesh Sharma
Date: 01/09/2025

Tenant: __________________ Nathan Pimenta
Date: 01/09/2025
